this_title: I Need a Dodge! Joe Strummer on the Run
trans_title: 我需要一辆道奇！乔·史特拉莫在路上
introduction: Joe Strummer's dodge It's 1997 and Joe Strummer is interviewed on Spanish radio. He mentions the car he bought in Madrid 12 years earlier but later lost. He puts out a call to the Spanish people to help him find it. The film discovers what Joe Strummer was doing in Spain in 1985 with The Clash falling apart and looks at the production of the 091 LP in post-dictatorship Madrid, while the director goes in search of Joe's Dodge.
chinese_title: 我需要一辆道奇！乔·史特拉莫在路上
foreign_title: I Need a Dodge! Joe Strummer on the Run
